name: Con Crunch
description:
You're a cosplayer preparing your costume- but the con's tomorrow!

A game by Heather Wright (lefthandedheather.itch.io/@lefthandedheather on IG), Hikari Oishi (hikariii.itch.io/@hikariii.io on IG), Brittany Reinhard, and Robyn Pelayo (@_robinthehood on IG)

Created as our final project for History of Game at Laguna College of Art + Design
